metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0161 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Stack overflow in XHCI for EDK II may allow an unauthenticated user topotentially enable denial of service via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-0161` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1
qemu-efi - 0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1
qemu-efi-arm - 0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0~20180803.dd4cae4d-1ubuntu1').
